# NSUserActivity.TypedPayloadError.invalidContent

**Case**

A decoding error that indicates that the user info dictionary is empty or invalid.

## Declaration

```swift
case invalidContent
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity/typedPayload(_:)] method throws this error.

## Typed payload errors

- **NSUserActivity.TypedPayloadError.encodingError**: An encoding error that indicates that the content failed to encode into a valid dictionary.
